title: Blacklist management
subtitle: This page allow to blacklist provider from onboarding data

premium.title: Premium content
premium.subtitle:
This feature is accessible only to clients with enterprise offers
It allow to blacklist specific provider from being used in Onboarding policy

validation.invalidProviderShortAddress: Provider address must be a short address
validation.internalErrorWhileCheckingProviderAddres: Internal error while checking address. Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
validation.addressAlreadyInBlacklist: This provider address is already blacklisted
validation.addressUsedInPolicyGroup: This provider address is used is a policy group. You must remove it before adding to blacklist

error.onRemoveFromBlacklist: An error occured while removing address from blacklist. Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
error.onInsertAddressToBlacklist: An error occurred while adding address to blacklist. Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.

empty.title: There are no blacklisted addresses under your account. You can use the form above to add the first one

error.generic: An error occurred retrieving blacklisted addresses. Please try again in a few minutes or contact the CIDgravity team.
